blog.title: I myself am also Enchanter Pumat Sol
blog.description:
Bixbi, older than you.

Fat queer of indeterminate origin.

Possibly a lesser demon.

Critical Role has taken over my life and my blog.

Taliesin Jaffe is my boyfriend.

I love you.

#eyesnevershut

hey I also have a kofi @ zroem
guess I'll just put this tag everywhere now since tumblr doesn't like links anymore
also I was rewatching Dangerous Liasions and Fjord asks the M9 if the power is something he should reject
and they all encourage him to go for it
and tell him if he starts getting weird they'll check him and pull him back
no one has pulled him back
jester even brought up the possibility that he could end up as warped as Avantika if he's not careful
and at the time Fjord makes it clear he thinks she's way far gone
that's right before the reward promise dream
summary: I'm realizing after thinking about that post about first impressions of Fjord vs the current impressions that the "team dad"...
body:
I’m realizing after thinking about that post about first impressions of Fjord vs the current impressions that the “team dad” vibe he had going at the start, the gruffness, the moral authority, the accent… All of that was more Vandran than it was ever Fjord.

Fjord struggles with his self-image and took to mimicking Vandran’s voice in his grief. Why would he stop there? Why not walk like him, talk like him, be the team dad like him? Be a mentor like him? People loved Vandran, and for someone who struggles with his self-worth, I can see Fjord deciding being Vandran was altogether better than being Fjord.

It would explain a lot about him, and how much he’s slipping, because he’s no longer confident in his image of Vandran and he’s not used to being himself. He might not even realize how “out of character” he’s acting because he’s literally slipped out of character.

I don’t know if this is obvious and I’m late to the show, or if this is just me overthinking it, but Fjord is such an interesting character I can’t not overthink it.

Fjord struggles with his self-image and took to mimicking Vandran’s voice in his grief. Why would he stop there? Why not walk like him, talk like him, be the team dad like him? Be a mentor like him? People loved Vandran, and for someone who struggles with his self-worth, I can see Fjord deciding being Vandran was altogether better than being Fjord.

It would explain a lot about him, and how much he’s slipping, because he’s no longer confident in his image of Vandran and he’s not used to being himself. He might not even realize how “out of character” he’s acting because he’s literally slipped out of character.

summary: So, everyone talks about how Sam’s humor, but can we talk about Taliesin’s? Yeah, it’s not in your face “haha” funny like Sam’s,...
body:
So, everyone talks about how Sam’s humor, but can we talk about Taliesin’s?

Yeah, it’s not in your face “haha” funny like Sam’s, but Tal knows when to deliver. He can read a situation so well that he knows when it’s time to add a little humor into the campaign and make things light hearted once again. 

Sam’s humor brings joy

Taliesin’s humor brings healing

blog.name: geekycriticalrolo
blog.title: “Just a disaster who plays Dungeons and Dragons.”
blog.description: "Maybe, but you're warm." Ayy I'm Alx,(Aka Rogue) Him/Her. I'm a Writer, a Gamer, A Hopeless Romantic, and a heavy D&D enthusiast. Some could say I talk about it way too much, but that's okay. Games I like: Persona 4, Persona 5, Resident Evil, Silent Hill,Layers Of Fear, The Last Of Us,Firewatch, Final Fantasy, Kingdom Hearts, The Legend Of Zelda and Mass Effect, to name a few. Tv shows I like: Stranger Things,Killing Eve,GoT, The-X-Files,F.R.I.E.N.D.S, IASIP and B99, but there's A LOT! more. Movies I like: The Dark Crystal, Lord of the rings,The Hobbit an many more. I'm also a Musician, D&D player, Comic reader, Cat lover and a Landscape Artist. (I am matching with Aerlinniell, my lovely Fiancé whom I love and adore with all my heart, and also with my dear friend Eltharii. These two are nerds and I have no idea what I'd do without them.)INFP:3 Triforce of courage. Header by MLeeLunsford:3

summary:
Goodbye 2018~ 
Listening to "Your Turn to Roll" from 11:59 pm to 12:00 midnight with a can of soda beside me and the X-files on...
body:
Goodbye 2018~

Listening to “Your Turn to Roll” from 11:59 pm to 12:00 midnight with a can of soda beside me and the X-files on my computer screen is exactly how I’ll be ending the year and starting another.

I do want to say though that last January a new journey for me began, a journey of self discovery. I wasn’t completely mentally stable nor was I even prepared for what was coming next but because of this year, 2018 I realized just how much one can lose and still remain strong. I’m grateful for what I’ve gained this year, what I’ve found and I couldn’t be more happier with the way this year is going to end. It’s been one hell of a ride and I’m ready to roll the dice even further to see where it lands, I’m ready to move on.

Thank you Critters for making this year wonderful with all of your fanart, fanfictions, music tracks and so on!

I look forward to a new year alongside everyone in the community!


So guys, How do you want to do this?

summary: The adventure begins…  I’m gonna be honest, 2018 was really harsh for me, however this show motivated me to keep going. Thank...
caption:
The adventure begins…

I’m gonna be honest, 2018 was really harsh for me, however this show motivated me to keep going. Thank you Critical Role for bringing so much joy into my life and I can’t wait to experience more, new exciting adventures in the upcoming future. Happy New Year everyone and remember…

How Do You Want To Do This?

blog.name: acepalindrome
blog.title: you're going to be something extraordinary
blog.description: Hello, this is Palindrome! I'm currently doing my best to pretend that I'm a functional and well adjusted adult, with varying levels of success! Around this neck of the woods you'll find history stuff, nature stuff, whatever fandoms I'm into at the moment, fanfics I write when I can muster up the energy, the occasional mental breakdown and a variety of fun facts I come across or things I find interesting. Feel free to follow or drop me a line, I promise I'm quite tame.

summary: I’m expecting the new Animal Crossing to let you choose your skin tone like in HHD and Pocket Camp because come on, it’s 2019...
body: I’m expecting the new Animal Crossing to let you choose your skin tone like in HHD and Pocket Camp because come on, it’s 2019 tomorrow, but I also hope they let you choose unnatural skin colors like green or purple because I want to create various members of the M9 and build the perfect house for them. I wanna make Molly and fill his house with gaudy crap and buy Jester the entire Sweets furniture set.
